heading: HB00527
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL COASTAL GREENBELT PROGRAM, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

status: Pending with the Committee on CLIMATE CHANGE since 2017-08-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00527
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL COASTAL GREENBELT PROGRAM, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : National Coastal Greenbelt Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Establishes greenbelts of mangroves and beach forests along the Philippines’ thirty-six thousand (36,000) kilometer coastline to help prevent the damaging effects of waves and storm surges and reduce the force of tsunami.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATOCABE, RODEL M., GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A., CO, CHRISTOPHER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
